frontmatter.description: A company's cash account records all the transactions related to cash. Similarly Bank also records all the transactions of its account. The balance of these two account should be equal. But in most cases they don't match properly.
frontmatter.title: Bank Reconciliation

frontmatter.description: Receivable is a due from any individual or company to other individual or company. Accounts receivable is a due that generated by selling products or services to individual or company.
frontmatter.title: Accounts Receivable
